Text:
I don't see how there are 92 seeders and 33 leechers. Everytime I try to download it says:

Cleared my cookies and downloaded the new uTorrent. Now it's working. Sorry for earlier comment! Thanks for a great upload :)

Joan Jett, Sandy West, Lita Ford, Mikki Steele, Cherrie Currie...
In a time when only dude's were playing lead guitar and were the lead singers in almost every rock band, these girls changed rock and roll and paved the way for the female rockers that we listen to today.
I dont know if The Runaways are in the R&R Hall of Fame, collectively, but if they are not, they should be.
Great share neonrainbow. 
Thank you.
